basics.name: Zachary Arrington
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I make maps and write code. A self taught, hard working Developer that is interested in modern technologies and building cool things.

work.name: Oncor Electric Delivery
work.summary: In the 5 years I have been with Oncor I have worked on several projects and initiatives to bring our utility network up to speed with the modern world. Using GIS as a launching point I was able to influence modern changes in decades old workflows and revolutionize processes. I was a full stack developer on muliple applications and managed all aspects of the development cycle.
highlights: GIS SME for enterprise wide GIS conversion project
Nominated for 2 Spirit of Innovation Awards
Produced applications that have saved hundred of man hours.

courses: Specialized focus on web based GIS

awards.title: Spirit of Innovation award Nominee
awards.summary: Award for individuals and teams in recognition of an innovative project or initiative that impacted the company and its daily processes.

projects.name: Distribution Upgrade Consensus Tool
projects.description: GIS platform that allows the the installation and tracking of electric automation devices.
highlights: Nominated for a Spirit of Innovation Award 2019

projects.name: Distribution Material Management Reports
projects.description: Reporting platform to track multiple process flows including financial information and material distribution and accounting.
highlights: Nominated for a Spirit of Innovation Award 2020
Built as a template for dynamic reporting.
